Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive console...
Reviews.Author: rex
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly powerful handheld console with a 1.5ghz dual core processor. If you are comfortable with downloading emulators from the Google Play store and playing your game roms, then this is a good console for you. Updating the firmware to a custom version is recommended as the stock firmware that ships has some weaknesses. The main disadvantage of this console is the poor battery life, averaging about 2 1/2 to 3 hours. I have been using mine for about 2 months without problems. Getting everything setup correctly takes some effort, but it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: fun android gamer
Reviews.Author: lon
Reviews.Content: we bought this for our so the game fanatic when we got our new phones .it`s performance is vary good ,but has a short battery life and eats chargers .play and charge from usb is fine but use the factory charge jack and you will kill a charger every week .
